item.title: My first post
item.description: I guess my first post should be something funny so here is one pic of my sleeping dogs. I hope my next post will be something more useful though :)

item.title: Resume
item.description: József Gábor Lázár Education 2011 - 2016 Bachelor of Mathematics – Eötvös Loránd University, Budapest – specialization: Applied Mathematics 2017 ISTQB certificate – International Software Testing Qualifications Board, Budapest – Foundation Level 2019 Machine Learning – Coursera – Standford University – Certificate Bachelor Thesis Title: An auto-catalytic reaction-diffusion equation’s numerical analysis Supervisor: Associate Professor, János Karátson Description: A reaction-diffusion equation is a special partial differential equation which models the concentration of the chemical substances in a reaction.
